name: Jason Sims - Light Break Nexus Reimagined

metadata.name: Jason Sims - 'Light Break (Nexus) Reimagined'
metadata.description: As an artist who works in the realm of perceptual art, reimagining my work in digital form provides a unique opportunity to play with perception without the constraints of the material world. Light Break (Nexus) Reimagined is a re-creation of one of my sculptures that uses the properties of light and reflection to create a simple illusion of space and form. Edition of 150.
